body_html:
probs need to replicate some of these with bias=False in constructor args:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_nn.py#L1562-L1581

I realized that we dont test for bias=False in any of the conv* modules, no wonder we didn't catch the bias=False break

body:
probs  need to replicate some of these with bias=False in constructor args:

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_nn.py#L1562-L1581

I realized that we dont test for bias=False in any of the conv* modules, no wonder we didn't catch the `bias=False` break
